Day Eighteen.
We found the Gate into the Inner Labyrinth, the structure is breathtaking ...
Maybe there is something to Navi's tales. They say that the Proteans were on the run from a deadly threat. They found a sanctuary at the center of the Labyrinth. While in the hiding they were finally able to discover a solution, but it was too late.
Navi believe that heroes will follow in the footsteps of the Proteans. Those, who overcome all the obstacles, will arrive into the heart of the Labyrinth, which is the location of the last sanctuary and once there, they will utter a Wish. This Wish will be fulfilled and the Proteans and the Labyrinth will again be free.
